markdownRemark.html:
I found the names of the songs on the Force Awakens Soundtrack. Don’t worry, no spoilers. 1

  1. 20th Century Fox Theme
  2. Star Wars Main Theme
  3. Luke’s Noble End
  4. Luke’s Funeral
  5. Han’s Funeral
  6. Luke’s Funeral (reprise)
  7. Luke’s Funeral Again
  8. A Cube Death Star?
  9. Luke’s Funeral
  10. Falcon’s Funeral
  11. Constructing a New Lightsaber
  12. Return of a Jedi Master
  13. Luke’s Funeral
  14. Darth Fangy Rises
  15. Darth Fangy’s Funeral
  16. Chewbacca Sandwich
  17. Victory Fanfare
  18. Luke’s Funeral
  19. Luke’s Funeral
  20. Luke’s Funeral
  21. End Credits

  1. For those of you who don't get the joke, read this.
